goals.description: Create advanced caching and memoization framework
goals.success_criteria: Comprehensive caching system with multi-level caching, TTL support, cache invalidation, and distributed caching capabilities

goals.description: Implement performance optimization and profiling tools
goals.success_criteria: Performance optimization framework with profiling, bottleneck detection, memory optimization, and automated tuning

goals.description: Build code optimization and compilation enhancements
goals.success_criteria: Code optimization system with bytecode optimization, JIT compilation hints, and runtime performance enhancements
